title: Live and Lime Die
description: *This is book 8 in the Key West Culinary Cozy Series*  Marilyn’s entire world is turned upside down in this last book of the Key West series. Just when their lives seem to be on an even keel, with the shop becoming more successful, Marilyn and Cort growing closer, and Tiara settling into her role as Manager of SubLime Sweets, the reappearance of someone from the past creates a sinister cloud over their idyllic existence. Tim, the “Creepy Guy Next Door,” plays a major role in the drama that grips them all in this series finale, and Marilyn is faced with some difficult decisions that may alter the course of all of their lives.  Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the series: Book 1: http://amzn.to/1CFOAbj Book 2: http://amzn.to/1MTwTZf Book 3: http://amzn.to/1U3VsSy Book 4: http://amzn.to/1fYPl4n Book 5: http://amzn.to/1id2usw Book 6: http://amzn.to/1OvZZxJ Book 7: http://amzn.to/1iThn34   Click the “buy now with 1 click” button at the top of the page OR Read it for FREE with Kindle Unlimited.
author: Summer Prescott
